metadata.dc:author: Nesbitt Falomir, C
metadata.dc:description: The different types of complications encountered with the application of BCG vaccine are described together with a scheme of its characteristics and application techniques. The use of oral vaccine is discarded. The normal and the different abnormal reactions are described; likewise, atypical localizations and all their consequences. Finally, pertinent recommendations for the application of this vaccine are made.
metadata.dc:title: Complicaciones de la vacuna BCG.
[Complications of BCG vaccine].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
